text: (Nampikkaiyalarkale! Nam) tutar oruvar niccayamaka unkalitam vantirukkirar; avar unkalilullavartan. (Unkalukku oru tunpam erpattu) ninkal kastattirkullaki vittal, atu avarukku mikka varuttamakave irukkum. (Avvalavu turam unkal mitu anputaiyavar.) Unkal nanmaiyaiye peritum virumpukiravarakavum, nampikkaiyalar(kalakiya un)kal mitu mikka irakkamum karunaiyum anpum utaiyavarakavum irukkirar
